|fields=CONCAT('[[',MU._pageName,'{{!}}{{(}}#invoke:GetFancyMapName{{!}}getFancyName{{!}}',MU._pageName,'{{)}}]] — {{(}}Ut{{!}}',U.WikiName,'{{)}}')

* This is a story exclusive Sacred Seal. It is exclusively equipped by {{Ht|Surtr: Ruler of Flame}} in [[:Category:Defensive battle maps|defensive battle maps]].
